pages.title: Using the Imbuer
pages.text: The imbuer features two places where items can go.

pages.title: Additional Features
pages.text: $(warning) Many of these features can be disabled via configuration. If something doesn't work, it may have been disabled in your modpack.$(br2)In addition to imbuing into the spell library, the imbuer allows you to perform the following actions:$(li)repair items for no XP cost using their repair ingredients$(li)
